group.name: OptionsMenu
group.str: Change Controls for Player 1 and Player 2!
Change Gameplay options such as Downscroll, Scroll Speed, Naughtyness...
Change Appearance options such as Flashing menus...
Change the language that the engine uses.
Use this menu to reset save data or engine settings.

group.name: AppearanceOptions
group.str: If unchecked, will disable antialiasing on every sprite. Can boost performances at the cost of sharper, more pixely sprites.
If unchecked, the game will use the orginal red/green health bar from the week 6 fnf game.
If checked, Week 6 will have a pixel perfect effect to it enabled, aligning every pixel on the screen.
If unchecked, gameplay shaders (visual effects like Thorns's Chromatic Aberration) wont be loaded; this may be helpful on weak devices.
If unchecked, will disable menu flashing when you select an option in the Main Menu, and other flashes will be slower.
If checked, will disable certain background elements in stages to reduce memory usage.

If checked, will only store the bitmaps in the GPU, freeing a LOT of memory (EXPERIMENTAL). Turning this off will consume a lot of memory, especially on bigger sprites. If you aren't sure, leave this on.
If checked, switching windows will pause the game.

group.name: GameplayOptions
group.str: If checked, notes will go from up to down instead of down to up, as if they're falling.
If unchecked, trying to hit any strum that have no note that can be hit will cause a miss.
Changes the offset that songs should start with.
If unchecked, will censor the Week 7 cutscenes.
If unchecked, will stop the camera from zooming in every 4 beats

group.name: MiscOptions
group.str: Select this option to force a crash.
If checked, will also include nightly builds in the update checking.
Select this option to check for new engine updates.
Select this option to reset save data. This will remove all of your highscores.

group.name: DebugOptions
group.str: Use this menu to enable or disable debug options.
Select this to show the debug console, which contains log information about the game.
If checked, will play sound effects when working on editors (ex: will play sfxs when checking checkboxes...)
If checked, the saved files from the editor will be formatted to be easily viewable (does not apply to xmls...)
If checked, will use more intensive blur that may be laggier but look better.
If checked, this will autosave your files in the editor, with the settings listed below.
This controls how often the editor will autosave your file (in seconds...)
This controls how long the editor will warn you before it autosaves (in seconds..., 0 to disable)
If checked, this will autosave your file in a seperate folder with a time stamp instead of overriding your current file. (song/autosaves/)
